title: Discord invite link
body:
Somebody just sent a discord link to all my friends this monday on my league account. Need assistance from a rioteer to sign me out from all devices and i will go ahead and change my account information.

Saw previous posts about this and it seems to be some "wave" going on happening to alot of people worldwide. If you get this link don't click it. I have no idea what it contains but it cannot be good. :)

replies.body: Hey there, [Gradius is currently investigating this ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lAjQToxn-a-new-way-of-accounts-getting-hacked)but your best bet is definitely to change your password.  I don't see anything out of the ordinary, but let me know if you would like to me to apply a security lock on your account.  You'll then want to reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to retrieve it.
